text: Ðis is þara V hyda boc æt Polhamatunæ þæ Edmund cining gæbocodæ Æðeldriðæ on ece yrfæ.
Þis synt þa landgemero to Polhæmatune.
Ærest of þrim beorgum to ruwan beorge þonon to deopan wege.
Þonon on yddeles hammas þonon on wiles yge ðonon be westan fecces wudu þær ða weges togeðre licgað þonon on ruwan hammas midde wearde.
Þonon andlang stret to bosan hangran þonon on fecces wudu easteweardne þonon on entan hlew þonon on mearcþorn of mearcþorne on terstan.
Of terstan andlang weges on þistel leage of þistel leage to bean leage þonon on suð leage eastewearde þonne þonon andlang cobban dæne æft of þrie beorgas.
